text: @ODNIgov In the history of zoonotic spillover COMMON COLD, FLU, SARS, EBOLA etc, why only NOW idols COVID-19 speculated at being man made or man released? Il tell you why, because their was no SOCIAL MEDIA in most of the other cases. Social Media was man made. It’s a virus of the MIND 🤯
